blogSlides.title: Font Awesome and React-Icons in React
blogSlides.content: Icons are visual cues which help communicate concepts on web pages and every other application. Icons also stand as visual language for effective communication and help user interpret a concept correctly.
blogSlides.alt: Font Awesome and React-Icons in React

blogSlides.categories: 12 Jan 2021 ・Updated on 11 Mar ・5 min read
blogSlides.title: CREATE, UPDATE, ADD and DELETE SEQUELIZE MIGRATION
blogSlides.content: Did you have an existing sequelize that you wish to make changes like adding more columns, delete or modify a particular column. Have you been deleting/dropping all the migration completely and re-run migrations all over again for changes to reflect?
blogSlides.alt: CREATE, UPDATE, ADD and DELETE SEQUELIZE MIGRATION

blogSlides.title: Prevent your Facebook Account from being hacked.
blogSlides.content: There are several ways/techniques which hackers use to breach people’s facebook accounts. However, we can prevent our accounts from the danger and damages of unauthorized users completely or at the minimal level just by following the right instructions at the right time. Do not wait until the control of your account is taken away from you by unauthorized users, thereby tampering with your identity.
blogSlides.alt: How to prevent your Facebook Account from being hacked?
